trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILVESPERBAY_00124_WILFRID_000_010<tab>I'm the harbormaster here at Vesper Bay. My responsibility is to ensure that all is smooth sailing, and at all times.

TEXT_REGWILVESPERBAY_00124_WILFRID_000_011<tab>I pride myself on maintaining the best facility on the mainland. Ours is a bustling port, and without sound management, things would very quickly run to chaos.
TEXT_REGWILVESPERBAY_00124_WILFRID_000_020<tab>Vesper Bay was built only a number of years ago, but, in a short span of time, it's grown into the premier ocean gateway to Ul'dah.

TEXT_REGWILVESPERBAY_00124_WILFRID_000_021<tab>That even the largest vessels might find mooring here, large-scale excavation was undertaken to deepen the seabed. 'Twas a costly venture made possible only through the generosity of Lord Lolorito.
TEXT_REGWILVESPERBAY_00124_WILFRID_000_022<tab>It's to him that our port owes its prosperity. There's no shortage of opportunities to be had by enterprising individuals.
